Trade/Device Name(s): Piccolo® Total Cholesterol - Capillary Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Piccolo Total Cholesterol - Capillary Test System, a quantitative enzymatic assay for cholesterol on capillary blood using the Piccolo xpress analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of total cholesterol in capillary (fingerstick) heparinized whole blood in clinical laboratory or point-of-care settings for diagnosis and treatment of cholesterol and lipid disorders.
